featured.text: Having received this 31 , the guru said, “Then this is what I’d like you to do for me.
Soon after their 36 , the guru died and the sow did have a litter of four little pigs.
The disciple said he would do whatever his guru asked him to do.

definition.zh_def: 導師；專家，尤其是在某一領域的權威。
definition.en_def: A teacher or expert, especially in a particular field.
definition.example: She is a yoga guru who has inspired many students.
